result.arabic_text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَتَهَجَّدۡ بِهِۦ نَافِلَةٗ لَّكَ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَبۡعَثَكَ رَبُّكَ مَقَامٗا مَّحۡمُودٗا
result.translation: 79. Nabiyow! barak tu xintek gamadal ugutaay, barti salat ab, barti salat fardi salaatih bagul darajaat ossantinah koh abnek, ku Rabbi Qhiyaamah ayro kaxxa shafaaqattah aracay fayla ley naharsi maraa kee ellecabö mari inkih kolle faylisal koo sooliselek.
